transcript.text:
￼














Products


Product Actions
Description

5 min
purpose this tab allows you to add a description of your product the more details you add about your product, the more your customers will know about the product while adding the description, you will have the option to add images (small & large) and five different types of descriptions (displayed on different pages of the front store) add description images small image – add a product image of a smaller size to be displayed on the home page and product listing pages large image – add the large image of the product to be displayed on the product page description for the product descriptions, you can create the content on your own or you can craft high quality content in a really quick time via the generate content and images using openai docid\ ay6htjgkoxs9bxnsn9qs4 feature short description – add the short description of the product here and it will be displayed on the home page as well as on the product listing page as displayed on the above screen long description – add the long description of the product in this field to be displayed on the product page as displayed on the above screen long description 2 this will also be displayed on the product info page to add this block on the product info screen, navigate to the store personalization >> product page layout >> click +add to add a layout >> under select block dropdown add – product description 2 upload centre description – this description is displayed at the upload center where the user can upload their designs directly browse design description – this description is displayed on the browse description page where the user will see the pre defined template
Did this page help you?
